## Summary

A brief one-line summary of the feature you'd like.

## Problem / Motivation

What problem does this solve? What use case does it address?

> _Example: "I find it tedious to switch between the terminal and Divan to check agent status because..."_

## Proposed Solution

Describe the feature you'd like to see. Be as specific as possible.

## Alternatives Considered

Are there other ways to solve this? Why is your proposed solution better?

## Mockup / Examples

If applicable, include sketches, screenshots, or links to similar implementations.

## Additional Context

Any other relevant context (related issues, OpenClaw features this depends on, etc.).
